## InjectedRemirrorProps.getPositionerProps() method

Attach these props to a component to inject it with position data. Typically this is used for creating menu components.

A custom positioner can be passed in to update the method used to calculate the position.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getPositionerProps<GRefKey extends string = 'ref'>(options: GetPositionerPropsConfig<GExtension, GRefKey>): GetPositionerReturn<GRefKey>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | <code>GetPositionerPropsConfig&lt;GExtension, GRefKey&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`GetPositionerReturn<GRefKey>`
